original_text: And he that burneth them shall wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in water, and afterward he shall come into the camp.
korean_text: 불사른 자는 그의 옷을 빨고 물로 그의 몸을 씻은 후에 진영에 들어갈지니라

sentences.original_text: and bathe his flesh in water
and afterward he shall come into the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그는 진으로 들어갈 것이다
